turtles <- rbind(turtle_0, turtle_1, turtle_2, turtle_3, turtle_4, turtle_5, turtle_6, turtle_7, turtle_8, turtle_9, turtle_10, turtle_11, turtle_12, turtle_13, turtle_14, turtle_15, turtle_16, turtle_17, turtle_18, turtle_19)

turtles$posted <- ifelse(turtles$id == lag(turtles$id), ifelse(turtles$post_ticks == lag(turtles$post_ticks), 0, 1), 1)
turtles <- turtles %>% filter(posted == 1)
turtles$lag_likes <- lag(turtles$likes)
turtles$latency <- ifelse(turtles$id == lag(turtles$id), turtles$tick - lag(turtles$tick), 0)

ggplot(turtles, aes(x=lag_likes, y=latency)) + 
  theme_linedraw() +
  geom_point() +
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")

m1 <- lm(latency ~ lag_likes, data = turtles)
summary(m1)
